food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys go crazy for me!
💛 My color is the same as the sun.
📏 I grow on trees and you peel me before eating.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Baby cows drink me.
🐄 I come from an animal that says 'Moo!'
🥶 I am best served cold.

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. You can bite me or make juice out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
🥧 People use me in pies.
👑 A famous fairy tale features me being poisoned.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves to snack on me.
🌱 I grow underground.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyesight.

food.question: I am made from milk and can be hard or soft. You can eat me with crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some mice love me!
🍕 I'm often melted on pizza.
🥪 You can put me in a sandwich.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. You might not like me, but I'm good for you. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a shell (or pod).
🍲 I can be added to soups.
🥦 Some kids don't want to eat me. (Not Broccoli)

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. You bake me in the oven. You can put butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make sandwiches with me.
🔥 You have to cook me, or I'm just dough.
🌾 I am often made from wheat.

food.question: I am a cold treat that comes in many flavors. I am often served in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 People scream for me!
🍨 I am kept very cold.
👅 I can be vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry flavored.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I am green inside and sweet to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I'm often found in fruit salads.
🌿 My skin feels a little bit hairy.
🟢 My color is the same as grass.

food.question: I am a grain that you cook in water. You can eat me plain or with sauce. Sometimes I'm white, brown, or even black. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I'm a staple food in many Asian countries.
🌍 I grow on a farm.
🍛 You can have me as a side dish with curry.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and I'm covered in shiny scales. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I wiggle my tail to move around.
🍽️ People like to eat me for dinner.
🌈 I can come in many different colors.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have claws that I use to pinch.
⛱️ I often hide under rocks at the beach.
🚶 My walk is a little bit funny.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and hold lots of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 You can travel on me.
🐳 Many animals live in me.
💧 I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I’m a very smart animal that lives in the ocean and loves to play. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I communicate using clicks and whistles.
🤸 I love doing flips and jumps in the water.
🧠 I'm known for my intelligence.

ocean.question: I'm a very slow sea creature with a hard shell on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach.
🥬 I like to eat seagrass.
🏖️ You might see me swimming or walking on land.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and can change color to hide. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I live at the bottom of the sea.
🎨 I can camouflage myself really well.
🖐️ I have no bones.

ocean.question: I'm a very large mammal that filters tiny creatures from the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm the biggest animal on Earth.
🎶 I sing songs to communicate.
💨 I breathe through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I'm a sharp-toothed fish known for hunting in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have lots of teeth!
🌊 I'm sometimes called a predator.
🎬 People are often scared of me in movies.

ocean.question: I am a home to many sea creatures, made of tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm made of coral.
🐠 Fish like to hide in me.
🌈 I come in many colors.

ocean.question: I’m a tiny, glowing creature that lives deep in the ocean and makes the water sparkle. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I create a light show in the dark.
🔬 You need a microscope to see me well.
🌊 Bioluminescence is my superpower.
